author: U Sudhakar Reddy
title: Sleepless in Kyiv: Ukraine faces constant drone attacks - Times of India
text: KYIV: In the early hours of September 26, the familiar sound of air raid alerts filled the skies over Kyiv, starting at 4.30 am and lasting until 7.30 am. Residents once again took refuge in bomb shelters as Russian drones targeted the capital, leading to explosions across several districts. For many, sleepless nights have become routine as drone attacks and air raid warnings disrupt the city's rhythm.The full-scale scale war, which began in Feb 2022, continues with full force, with Russia regularly sending drones into Ukrainian airspace. The people of Kyiv and other regions have become accustomed to hours spent in bomb shelters, especially at night. While some have grown immune to the alarms, choosing to stay at home despite the danger, others continue to face the stress of running for safety every night."I heard the Shahid engine just minutes ago, followed by air defence shots," said Volodymyr Solovian, a hybrid warfare analyst in Kyiv. "These drones usually move behind the Dnipro river, and this time I saw air defence tracers over the Dnipro. Drone attacks on Kyiv have become frequent, happening five or six times a month."The scale of the aerial threat is immense. According to official data, from February 24, 2022 to September 25, 2024, a total of 47,577 air raid alerts were issued across 141 Ukrainian districts. Of these, 1,270 alerts were in Kyiv, with the average alert lasting one hour and nine minutes. The longest recorded alert lasted an exhausting 50 hours and 30 minutes. Most air raids are triggered between midnight and 6 am, and officials imposed curfew round the year during these hours.113718552Out of all the alerts, around 12,740 explosions were reported, meaning that about one in four warnings turned into actual missile or drone strikes. These figures exclude artillery shelling, which has also become a constant threat in the eastern region of Ukraine bordering Russia. The regions of Donetsk, Kharkiv, and Zaporizhzhia have seen the highest number of air alerts, while Kherson, Sumy, Donetsk, and Kharkiv have reported the most explosions.Iryna Valenkeych, a 70-year-old resident of Borodianka, spoke of the fear that grips her every night. "Every day is a nightmare," she said. "We are afraid when we go to sleep. Air alerts sound six times a night. We are scared." She recounted the story of her family where her brother was killed by Russian forces earlier in the war, making the nightly alarms even more terrifying.In Kyiv and Lviv cities, bomb shelters have become an essential part of daily life. Converted cellars and underground floors of commercial buildings are now used as safe spaces. Metro stations serve as a refuge for many urban residents. In the village of Moschun, in Kyiv region, even an underground billiards room has been turned into a shelter.The impact on children is especially concerning. Inna Sovsun, a people's deputy (member of Parliament) from the opposition Holos Party, described the strain on her 11-year-old son. "We live in constant fear of air raid alerts. The children are under extreme pressure. In Oct 2022 my son asked me if we were going to die during one of the alerts. He was scared it might be a nuclear bomb. It's heartbreaking that kids are being taught how to survive a nuclear attack at school," she said.As Kyiv and other regions across Ukraine continue to face relentless air attacks, Ukrainian air defence forces are working to intercept the drones.While Kyiv remains under constant threat, residents are doing their best to cope with the daily uncertainty and fear, hoping for a time when the air raid alarms fall silent for good.

author: Rashad Milligan
title: Black man becomes 1st living patient with successful pig kidney transplant
text:
A Black man was the recipient of the first successful pig
kidney transplant.
Massachusetts man Rick Slayman was discharged from the
hospital on April 3, two weeks after his operation.
â€œWe are happy to share that today, Rick Slayman, our first patient to ever receive a genetically edited pig kidney transplant, has been discharged from the hospital,â€ the
https://twitter.com/MassGeneralNews posted on X, formerly known as Twitter. â€œHe is recovering well, and will continue to recuperate at home with his family.â€
The post included two photos, one of him sitting up and smiling, and another one of him standing next to surgeons.
We are happy to share that today, Rick Slayman, our first patient to ever receive a genetically edited pig kidney transplant, has been discharged from the hospital. He is recovering well and will continue to recuperate at home with his family.
[pic.twitter.com/26a9f9T85N]
â€” MassGeneral News (@MassGeneralNews)
[April 3, 2024]
â€œThis moment â€“ leaving the hospital today with one of the cleanest bills of health Iâ€™ve had in a long time â€“ is one I wished would come for many years,â€ Slayman said in a statement issued by the hospital, according to CNN. â€œNow, itâ€™s a reality and one of the happiest moments of my life.â€
The 62-year-old is a manager with the Massachusetts Department of Transportation. He previously said a doctor recommended he try the pig kidney when he was diagnosed with end-stage kidney disease.
Last month, Slaymanâ€™s doctors said a new kidney could last years, but there are also many unknowns in animal-to-human transplants. The hospital said the surgery, which occurred on March 16, happened after years of research and pre-clinical studies.

author: Filipe Carbone
title: EstÃºdio de Control e Alan Wake, Remedy revela detalhes de novo multiplayer
text:
A Remedy Entertainment, estÃºdio responsÃ¡vel por tÃ­tulos como Control e Alan Wake, revelou detalhes de seu novo projeto multiplayer, FBC: Firebreak. Durante a transmissÃ£o Xbox Partner Preview, o estÃºdio apresentou o primeiro trailer de gameplay do jogo. AlÃ©m disso, destacou que ele marcarÃ¡ a estreia da Remedy no gÃªnero multiplayer cooperativo.
FBC: Firebreak Ã© um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa cooperativo para trÃªs jogadores. De acordo com Thomas Puha, Diretor de ComunicaÃ§Ãµes da Remedy, o objetivo Ã© oferecer uma experiÃªncia divertida e acessÃ­vel. Dessa forma, que isso permita aos jogadores enfrentarem missÃµes agitadas com seus amigos.
AlÃ©m disso, o estÃºdio revelou que a narrativa Ã© ambientada no mesmo universo de Control. Entretanto, o estÃºdio se esforÃ§a para deixar claro que o jogo nÃ£o Ã© uma sequÃªncia nem uma expansÃ£o.
No jogo, o jogador assume o papel de um agente do Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). Ele enfrenta ameaÃ§as paranaturais na Casa Antiga, sede do FBC. Equipados com â€œparanatural augmentsâ€, os agentes tÃªm acesso a habilidades especiais, como foi mostrado no trailer. O destaque vai para uma arma em forma de gnomo de jardim.
Leia mais
Tencent concede emprÃ©stimo de 15 milhÃµes de euros Ã  Remedy Control 2 nÃ£o serÃ¡ impactado por demissÃµes na Annapurna Interactive Alan Wake e Control virarÃ£o filmes com acordo entre Remedy e Annapurna Remedy reforÃ§a que FBC: Firebreak nÃ£o possui ligaÃ§Ã£o com Control AlÃ©m disso, a Remedy vem explorando novos desafios com esse projeto. Apesar de ser o primeiro multiplayer do estÃºdio, a equipe trouxe novos talentos para colaborar na criaÃ§Ã£o do jogo. Entretanto, eles mantiveram um nÃºcleo de desenvolvedores experientes para garantir que o projeto preserve as caracterÃ­sticas marcantes da empresa.
Por fim, mesmo sendo uma experiÃªncia cooperativa, a Remedy continua fiel ao seu estilo de narrativas envolventes. Dessa forma, Kayatta explicou que, embora FBC: Firebreak se passe apÃ³s os eventos de Control, os jogadores nÃ£o precisam ter jogado o tÃ­tulo anterior para entender a histÃ³ria.
Foto: DivulgaÃ§Ã£o/Remedy Entertainment PorÃ©m, aqueles que conhecem o jogo anterior encontrarÃ£o diversas referÃªncias e elementos familiares do universo de Control. FBC: Firebreak tem previsÃ£o de lanÃ§amento para 2025, com versÃµes para Xbox Series X|S e PC, e estarÃ¡ disponÃ­vel no Game Pass no dia do lanÃ§amento. O estÃºdio, por fim, promete atualizaÃ§Ãµes constantes e novos conteÃºdos apÃ³s o lanÃ§amento.
Fonte: Xbox
ConteÃºdo Relacionado nÃºmeros impressionantes

author: Milagro Sanchez Florez
title: UPC rechaza asesinato de docente de derecho en Valledupar |
text: El asesinato con arma de fuego de Joe Luis Cabrera RamÃ­rez , de 40 aÃ±os, a las afueras del centro comercial Unicentro de Valledupar , ha generado rechazo general en la comunidad, que clama justicia. Leer mÃ¡s: Patrullajes permanentes y $30 millones de recompensa tras masacre en CaracolÃ­ Este hombre de profesiÃ³n abogado y docente de la Universidad Popular del Cesar, fue abordado por delincuentes que lo intimidaron, al parecer, para robarle una cadena de oro que llevaba puesta en su cuello, pero la vÃ­ctima habrÃ­a puesto resistencia y a cambio recibiÃ³ el mortal disparo. De interÃ©s: Un Ã¡rbitro sinceano debuta este sÃ¡bado en el FÃºtbol Profesional Colombiano Frente a este crimen desde la UPC emitieron un comunicado a la opiniÃ³n pÃºblica, condenando lo sucedido.â€œSu trÃ¡gica muerte es una pÃ©rdida irreparable para la educaciÃ³n y la sociedad en general. Exigimos a las autoridades judiciales y policiales que se realicen las investigaciones correspondientes para esclarecer las circunstancias de su muerte y se castigue a los responsables con todo el rigor de la ley. Es fundamental que se haga justicia para Joe y su familia, y que se garantice la seguridad y protecciÃ³n de todos los miembros de la comunidad educativaâ€, se lee en el comunicado. Lea aquÃ­: Familiares del rector Armando Rivero reclaman justicia tras su crimen De igual manera hacen un llamado a la FiscalÃ­a General de la NaciÃ³n, la PolicÃ­a Nacional y demÃ¡s autoridades competentes para que tomen medidas inmediatas y efectivas para esclarecer este crimen y evitar que se repitan hechos similares en el futuro.

title: Top 10 Best Football Players of August 2024 | 22Bet Expert Opinion
text: 10. Achraf Hakimi (Marocco, Paris Saint-Germain) - In August: 2 goals, 2 assists. Even in the match they lost [against Spain](https://news.22bet.com/predictions/morocco-vs-spain-football-summer-olympic-games-05-08-2024/), Hakimi managed six tackles and four assists, which could have made a difference for Morocco in their quest for the final. This has become especially important following the arrival of another attacking player, [Kylian MbappÃ©](https://news.22bet.com/wiki/players/kylian-mbappe/), a forward less inclined toward defensive duties. In addition, Valverde outplays opponents with his strong dribbling and regularly creates openings in the opponentâ€™s penalty area, occasionally scoring goals. 8. After all, he continues to be the creative engine of the team, regularly orchestrating dangerous moments in the final third. Not The Result we wanted but I am still proud of my team [#B04RBL][pic.twitter.com/0JjhEuhI7O]â€” Florian wirtz (@FlorianWirtz10) [September 1, 2024] 7. Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Napoli) - In August: 1 goal, 1 assist. After Antonio Conteâ€™s arrival as Napoliâ€™s head coach, it became clear that [Khvicha Kvaratskhelia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khvicha_Kvaratskhelia) would have to adapt to the teamâ€™s new 3-4-3 formation. Conte prefers a system with three central defenders and two wing-backs, while Kvaratskhelia thrived as a left forward in a 4-3-3 / 4-2-3-1 formation. Despite the shift, the Georgian is adjusting well to the new system and effectively operates in the left half-space. In the new season, â€œKvaradona â€œcould emerge as one of [Serie Aâ€™s](https://news.22bet.com/tag/serie-a-24-25/) top performers this season. 6. Marcus Thuram (Inter Milan) - In August: 5 goals. [Marcus Thuram](https://www.sofascore.com/player/marcus-thuram/791702) has made an explosive start to the season, scoring 5 goals in August, inlcuding two braces â€“ one of which came in a crucial victory against [Atalanta](https://news.22bet.com/predictions/inter-vs-atalanta-match-preview-prediction-betting-tips-30-08-2024/). After netting 13 goals in Serie A last season, Thuram is already proving instrumental in Inter Milanâ€™s quest to defend their league title. Mason Greenwood (Olympique de Marseille) - In August: 6 goals. [Mason Greenwood](https://www.transfermarkt.com/mason-greenwood/profil/spieler/532826) is fully showcasing his talent under Roberto De Zerbiâ€™s guidance at [Olympique de Marseille](https://www.om.fr/en) and could well compete for the title of top scorer in [Ligue 1](https://news.22bet.com/tag/ligue-1-24-25/). De Zerbi on Mason Greenwood: â€œMason is a very high level player, we all wanted him, the owner also got involved in person. There has been so much controversy, so much talk, but we all see the player on the pitch. I donâ€™t want to get into his private life, I donâ€™t know anythingâ€¦ [pic.twitter.com/lD4wqtfSoj]â€” Kara (@UTDKara) [September 1, 2024] Greenwood has scored in five consecutive matches and shows no signs of stopping, as he is in excellent physical condition. His transfer from Manchester United for â‚¬26 million this summer looks like a bargain, as he could have been a valuable asset for the [Premier League](https://news.22bet.com/tag/premier-league-24-25/) side. 4. Bukayo Saka (Arsenal) In August: 1 goal, 3 assists. [Bukayo Saka](https://www.whoscored.com/Players/367185/Show/Bukayo-Saka) has quickly achieved peak physical condition among the English players who represented the national team in [Euro 2024](https://news.22bet.com/tag/uefa-euro-2024/) and has already become [Arsenalâ€™s](https://news.22bet.com/wiki/club-teams/arsenal/) standout player in August. Bukayo Saka remains the only Arsenal player in history to score or assist against every team heâ€™s faced in the Premier League âš½ï¸ðŸŽ¯ [pic.twitter.com/yWHe4gBZwu]â€” ESPN UK (@ESPNUK) [September 5, 2024] Saka is valuable in fast combinations and maneuvers. Most importantly, he dangerously shoots at the goal from different positions. He also excellently performs varied crosses and cutbacks into the opponentsâ€™ penalty area. While he has scored only one goal, he is poised to become Arsenalâ€™s top scorer again. 3. Erling Haaland (Manchester City) - In August: 10 goals Pep Guardiola continues integrating the Norwegian forward into his attacking model, leveraging Haalandâ€™s remarkable ability to convert chances. No club has scored more Premier League goals than Erling Haaland this season ðŸ’€ðŸ¤– [pic.twitter.com/FxTdUEUINy]â€” OneFootball (@OneFootball) [September 3, 2024] Although [Haaland](https://www.sofascore.com/player/erling-haaland/839956) is minimally involved in combinations with his teammates, his efficiency in the penalty area is unparalleled. With 10 goals in August alone, Haaland is proving once again that he is one of the worldâ€™s most dangerous strikers. 2. Raphinha (Barcelona) - In August: 3 goals, 3 assist In recent years, European journalists have speculated about whether [Barcelona](https://news.22bet.com/wiki/club-teams/barcelona/) truly needs [Raphinha](https://www.whoscored.com/Players/300447/Show/Raphinha). Over the summer, there were even rumors that the Brazilian might leave the team, as he had few chances on the right flank, where he had to compete with the brilliant young talent Lamine Yamal. But Hansi Flick was able to maximize Raphinhaâ€™s best qualities by giving him more attacking freedom in the area between the lines. Raphinha Rises. [pic.twitter.com/TBdZr9H6X6]â€” FC Barcelona (@FCBarcelona) [September 4, 2024] Raphinha effectively beats defenders 1v1, makes penetrating passes into the penalty area, creates multi-pass combinations with teammates, and makes well-timed runs behind opponents into the penalty area. At the same time, he is very useful in pressing. If he continues to play like this, he could be in contention for the title of La Ligaâ€™s best player this season. 1. Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) In August: 4 goals, 4 assists. As has become tradition, [Mohamed Salah](https://www.sofascore.com/player/mohamed-salah/159665) is demonstrating top-class performance after the summer break, making a strong case for being considered the worldâ€™s best player. The rested Egyptian consistently makes a difference in the first part of the season but gradually slows down after January. They donâ€™t really believe that Mohamed Salah is among the top 30 players in the world Hahaha wth this award has lost its credibility. [pic.twitter.com/AxD5iSYiIw]â€” â·ð¸Â¹Â¹ (@spumar7T) [September 4, 2024] Salah particularly feels the strain of the intense Premier League schedule from November to mid-January, exacerbated by his trip to the African Cup of Nations last year. However, just like in previous seasons, Salah is unstoppable in August and brings immense value to [Liverpool](https://news.22bet.com/wiki/club-teams/liverpool/), making a difference in every match. Salah is so magnificent in all attacking phases of play that itâ€™s impossible not to place him at the top of the list of the best players in August 2024.

author: Daniela Santos
title: Whindersson Nunes Ã© internado em clÃ­nica psiquiÃ¡trica em SÃ£o Paulo
text:
A equipe de Whindersson Nunes comunicou a decisÃ£o do humorista de se internar em uma clÃ­nica psiquiÃ¡trica para cuidar da sua saÃºde mental
O humorista
Whindersson Nunes estÃ¡ internado em uma clÃ­nica psiquiÃ¡trica no interior de SÃ£o Paulo para cuidar da saÃºde mental. A informaÃ§Ã£o foi revelada pela empresa Non Stop ProduÃ§Ãµes ArtÃ­sticas, que gerencia a carreira do youtuber, a site Hugo Gloss.
Segundo a nota, o famoso tomou a decisÃ£o por conta prÃ³pria e com acompanhamento de um mÃ©dico especializado. "O humorista se internou, por decisÃ£o prÃ³pria e com o devido acompanhamento mÃ©dico, em uma clÃ­nica psiquiÃ¡trica no interior de SÃ£o Paulo., na Ãºltima semana. O motivo da internaÃ§Ã£o Ã© o cuidado com sua saÃºde, buscando o tratamento adequado para seu bem-estar", diz o comeÃ§o do comunicado.
"Sempre preocupado com seus fÃ£s e com o pÃºblico, Whindersson tomou essa decisÃ£o visando o cuidado integral de sua saÃºde. Ele estÃ¡ muito bem, feliz com sua evoluÃ§Ã£o e, em breve, estarÃ¡ de volta aos palcos fazendo o que mais ama. Agradecemos a compreensÃ£o de todos e ressaltamos que a privacidade e o respeito sÃ£o fundamentais neste momento", concluiu a equipe do artista.
No ano passado, Whindersson emocionou seus seguidores ao compartilhar
um relato sobre sua "Ãºnica tentativa de suicÃ­dio". O humorista contou que tinha um amigo que costumava deixar sua arma de fogo acessÃ­vel em alguns ambientes de sua casa e em um dia em que estava se sentindo bem, depois de ter superado seu vÃ­cio em drogas ilÃ­citas, ele teve uma crise ao visitar esse rapaz, encontrou a arma e se trancou no quarto com ela. O comediante confessou ter tentado tirar a prÃ³pria vida, mas nÃ£o conseguiu. Em questÃ£o de segundos, ele conta que travou o objeto novamente, foi tomar banho e comeÃ§ou a refletir profundamente sobre sua vida.
Confira o comunicado na Ã­ntegra:
Em sua
rede social, Whindersson Nunes fez um desabafo a respeito de sua vida pessoal. O humorista, que enfrenta uma depressÃ£o hÃ¡ alguns anos, contou que, pela primeira vez, nÃ£o se sentiu bem ao se apresentar publicamente. "Primeira vez que a depressÃ£o fez eu nÃ£o me sentir bem com um microfone na mÃ£o. Aprendi mais uma", escreveu ele.
Leia tambÃ©m:
Whindersson Nunes mostra transformaÃ§Ã£o no corpo apÃ³s perder 15kg
